message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you take $30. It's best to settle now before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Alice, your offer was too low. Let's be reasonable. I'll take $60, you take $40. This is a fair deal considering the inflation.
Bob, let's be realistic. Inflation is hurting both of us. I'll take $60, leaving you with $40. It's better than dragging this out further and losing even more.
